DOC.brief_title: Adding Guided Self-Help Group Therapy Alli Weight Loss Program Treating Binge Eating Disorder
DOC.detailed_description: Binge eat disorder one common eat disorder , 4 million Americans affect . Following binge eat episode , person eats excessive amount food short period time , person often experience feeling guilt , depression , embarrassment , disgust . Beyond emotional distress cause binge eating , people binge eat high risk serious health problem associate weight gain . These health problem may include high blood pressure , diabetes , heart disease , high cholesterol , certain type cancer . Thus , seek effective treatment binge eat disorder vital affect person 's overall physical mental well-being . Managed weight loss program , combine certain form psychotherapy , show success provide direction proper motivation eat healthily prevent future binge eat episode . This study evaluate effectiveness add guide self-help group therapy alli weight loss program achieve weight loss reduce binge eat overweight binge eater . Participation single-blind study last 36 week . Initial assessment divide two 1- 2-hour session . These assessment include history medical illness , height weight measurement , eat disorder evaluation . Participants also answer several questionnaire self-esteem , feeling depression , emotion eating . Participants randomly assign one two treatment group : alli program use weight loss drug orlistat alli program use orlistat plus guided self-help group psychotherapy . All participant take over-the-counter weight loss medication orlistat three time day 12 week conjunction alli program , comprehensive weight loss program online access . Participants assign psychotherapy group also attend 12 weekly guide self-help group psychotherapy session . These session include behavioral support adapt lifestyle change promote alli weight loss program . All participant undergo 12 week active participation , 18 week maintenance , 18 week follow-up . At various interval first 6 month study , participant answer short group question concern current binge eat habit ; adherence prescribe food , activity , medication plan ; emotional state . The initial assessment repeat Weeks 12 , 30 , 42 .
